title: nan en sheivEn
sahitya:
nAn en sheivEn sAmi nAthAn  aruL sheyyAviDil



anupallavi



Ananda mAkanda anavaratamun anda mAna padam ninaindu atyanta bhaktiyil

munda



caraNam



shEyA mAyA mALavagauLAdi mELarAga tALa sancAra kavi kunjaradAsan

AyAdu izhainda pizhai adu nI poruttu vizhai nEyA mighundu aruLai nI koDuttaruL

Ezhai
